structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY GOVERNMENT (FISCAL COURTS AND COUNTY COMMISSIONERS)

law.text: It shall be the duty of the officers of said election in each voting precinct to hold said election the same hours they are by law required to hold election for county officers and said election shall be held and conducted in all respects under the general election laws obtaining in this Commonwealth at the time of the election.
